intro: Have you graduated beyond the clip-on tie? Beginning with these helpful instructions, a sharp-looking tie, a mirror, and some patience, you can become an expert in tying your own fashionable knot. You have several options available, from the versatile Four-in-Hand Knot to the classic Windsor.

points.name: Tying the Traditional Windsor Knot (Extra Formal)
Tying the Pratt Knot (Basic Formal Knot)

steps.title: Slide the knot to adjust.
steps.subtitle: Pull down on the wide end to tighten. Slide the front knot up to the base of your collar to fasten the tie.
sub-points: To create a dimple just below the front knot, squeeze the sides of the knot gently as you tighten.
